song.title: Lovelight
song.info:
1st place on MC6 veteran entrys
Lyrics: (breathing)
You may tell me you knew it (x3) Was when I was around
You may tell me you knew it (x3) Was when I was around
--
You always let me down You always made me feel this way And I don't think that you Can understand my words today
Yeaaah yeahhh
Always let me (x3) Always let me down
In a touch creating (x3) Love like the light
In a touch creating (x3) Love like the light
--
repeat
